content.rendered:
Tired of Being Stiff as a Board?

Are you ready to join me on my journey to more flexibility and less pain? Check out some of the improvements I’ve already made and learn more about why I’m so excited about Joe “The Guru” and what he can do for you!

Join Me at the Seminar in Orlando!

Join us in Orlando, FL for our 1st Seminar of 2023, scheduled for January 27-29. This seminar is 12 hours of intensive interactive flexibility work. You will learn how to take care of your own body and how to eliminate pain/injury while learning the standards for Range of Motion and the science behind flexibility. You will learn how to train your body back to optimal health with an ongoing program relevant to all needs and lifestyles. This program is for everyone.

SEMINAR SCHEDULE:

  • Friday, January 27, 1-5pm
  • Saturday, January 28, 10am to 2pm (plus lunch)
  • Sunday, January 29, 10am to 2pm

Click the big button below to visit our partner’s site to find out more and purchase it. Just to be upfront… I’ll earn a percentage on any purchases you make. That’ll help us keep making more great content for you!

Use code CLAYBALLARD for a 10% discount!

Purchase the Building Blocks Course!

Discover the ONLY flexibility routine in the world that has EXACT scientific standards that eliminates virtually all pain and injuries. You will learn why to stretch, how to stretch, when to stretch, how long to stretch, and the proper way to stretch (18 variables total), to increase flexibility/mobility and live a pain and injury free life.

This is for you if…

  • You have any pain in your body
  • You are recovering from an injury
  • The medical or therapy world has no answers for you
  • You feel there must be a better way
  • You want life changing results
  • You are looking for a miracle

Click the big button below to visit our partner’s site to find out more and purchase it. Just to be upfront… I’ll earn a percentage on any purchases you make. That’ll help us keep making more great content for you!

Use code CLAYBALLARD for a 10% discount!
